page.title: 06Development Board
page.content: K.T.K. which manufactures electronic testing equipment are already established on the site.The Board is currently responsible for a shopping development in Broad Street. One of the projects undertaken by the Board is the building of St.Mary's Close on the site of the old tannery,which moved in 1981 to a new, modern tannery on the Pool Rd.. St.Mary's Close is on the banks of the River Severn and is close to the town centre.49, one or two bedroomed flats,and 13 maisonettes have been built at St.Mary's Close.The occupants are either young married couples or old people.The buildings have been built in traditional red brick. St.Marys Close is very important because it improved the looks of the town and brought people back to live in the centre of the town.
